name: Sky Lantern
description:
Because writing a game in Unity was actually part of my new year's resolution, I decided to step away from Java AWT for a while...
You know what they say... "New Year, New Me"

Yeah... There's not much to say about this project. I wanted to work on it more, but didn't get the chance to do so.

Game Instructions

Once the game loads, hit the space bar to get a sky lantern to launch.

Once the lantern launches, arrow keys can move the lantern around.

Source code at https://github.com/plankp/Sky-lantern

Web version of the game (at the cost of strange color scheme) at https://plankp.github.io/Sky-lantern/

Note: Some web browsers (happened on Safari) will not be able to play the web version. Downloading the game is recommended.
